List of Features

Project Overseer is a set of development tools for developing smart farming and gardening tools. The project can be used by any individual and/or organization commercially.

This page will give you a better explnation on how this project will developed overtime and the different functionalities that the project will offer.

Before We Start

It is important to keep in mind that the project is still in its early stages so some of the information listed in this documentation will be subjected to changes, whether it will be adding, changing, or even removing the listed features and functionalities.

About Project Overseer

Project Overseer is a Python development framework that will allow you to develop smart farming and smart gardening solutions. Projects made with Project Overseer can be used with Raspberry Pi 3 and newer, including the Raspberry Pi Pico. You can also deploy your solutions in the cloud.

Organization of the Documentation

This documentation is organized based on the major topics of the project.
